question: Which union ministry launched a Web Portal WDRA & e-NWR in New Delhi?
option1: Minister of Health and Family Welfare
explanation: Shri Ram Vilas Paswan, Union Minister of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution today launched the Web Portal of Warehousing Development and Regulatory Authority (WDRA) & "Electronic Negotiable Warehouse Receipt (e-NWR) System" in New Delhi.
